thread.title: Surprise! 'Fantastic Beasts' and 'Suicide Squad' now both have Oscars
thread.title_full: Surprise! 'Fantastic Beasts' and 'Suicide Squad' now both have Oscars

author: Proma Khosla
title: Surprise! 'Fantastic Beasts' and 'Suicide Squad' now both have Oscars
text:
Surprise! 'Fantastic Beasts' and 'Suicide Squad' now both have Oscars 0 By Proma Khosla 2017-02-27 02:24:42 UTC 
Talk about an upset. Science fiction and fantasy movies haven't always fared well at the Academy Awards, but within minutes of each other, Suicide Squad and Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them won Oscars for makeup and costume design, respectively. 
These are big — and confusing — wins for Warner Bros. and fans of both DC's comic books and Harry Potter. 
— Elisabeth Joffe (@elisabethjoffe) February 27, 2017 SUICIDE SQUAD for makeup and FANTASTIC BEASTS for costume - big night at the #Oscars for looks u can now buy at HOT TOPIC. 
— MAX IM A KOOPA (@meakoopa) February 27, 2017 I thought Academy Award winner #SuicideSquad was enjoyable.... 
— Joe Moses (@thejoemoses) February 27, 2017 I just knew this whole night was going to be about Suicide Squad and Fantastic Beasts. What elitist assholes! #Oscars 
— Mark Harris (@MarkHarrisNYC) February 27, 2017 Suicide Squad has won 100 percent of its nominated Oscars. The world is a sewer. 
— Mark Lisanti (@marklisanti) February 27, 2017 HARRY POTTER FILM FRANCHISE FINALLY WON AN OSCAR #Oscars 
— Eric J Scull (@spielerman) February 27, 2017 Congrats @ikebarinholtz for best hair and makeup for #suicidesquad ! They made you look so weird heh heh heh 
— Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) February 27, 2017 The Academy Award winning movie Suicide Squad. I'm not good. 
— Mark Harris (@MarkHarrisNYC) February 27, 2017 fantastic beasts and where to get an oscar
